text: The 2016 Scottish Rugby U-20 Championship will be contested from July - August 2016. The tournament is run by the Scottish Rugby Union and will be competed for by the 4 regional teams from the BT Sport Scottish Rugby Academy. The U-20 Championship is three rounds of the regional round-robin with conclusion on 21 August. ==Teams== The following teams take part in the 2016 Scottish Rugby U-20 Championship: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;
